thread.title: Ivanka Trump Is Reportedly Getting a West Wing Office
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Is Reportedly Getting a West Wing Office

author: Josh Feldman
title: Ivanka Trump Is Reportedly Getting a West Wing Office

organizations.name: west wing office ivanka trump is reportedly getting a west wing office

text:
Ivanka Trump Is Reportedly Getting a West Wing Office by Josh Feldman | 7:00   
First daughter Ivanka Trump , per multiple reports tonight, will be getting an office in the West Wing. 
Politico , NBC News , and the Associated Press are all reporting that President Trump ‘s daughter will be getting her own office, but not an official position in the White House. 
Per Politico : 
Ivanka Trump’s role, according to her attorney Jamie Gorelick, will be to serve as the president’s “eyes and ears” while providing broad-ranging advice, not just limited to women’s empowerment issues… 
“Having an adult child of the president who is actively engaged in the work of the administration is new ground,” Gorelick conceded in an interview on Monday. “Our view is that the conservative approach is for Ivanka to voluntarily comply with the rules that would apply if she were a government employee, even though she is not.” A spokeswoman for Ivanka Trump said her role was signed off on by the White House counsel’s office, and the conflict issues were “worked through” with the office of government ethics. 
Ivanka Trump is also reportedly in the process of getting security clearance. 
[ image via Albert H. Teich/Shutterstock ]
